Name: Mother Rum
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: To quote Milo, this drink is "warm and comforting, just like the drinks my mother made."
History: Created in 2006 by Milo Rodriguez at Crazy Bear in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Mother Rum contains 220 calories
